#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  int n;
  scanf("%d",&n);
  char str[n];
  scanf("%s",str);
  long double a,f;
  scanf("%Lf %Lf",&a,&f);

  long double count=a;
  int i=1;
  bool flag=0;
  while(str[i]!='\0')
    {
      if(str[i]==str[i-1])
        {
           count=count+a;
           if(count>=f)
             {
               flag=1;
               break;
             }

        }
       else   count=a;
       i++;

    }

  if(flag==1) printf("NO");
  else printf("YES");

return 0;
}
